title: Mini-Ep: Pressure, Pats, and Face Taps
itunes:title: Mini-Ep: Pressure, Pats, and Face Taps
itunes:subtitle: Kate turns into a 90’s teen at Claire’s and Doree turns into Super Mom in a moment of panic. Then, listeners call in asking about how to improve your partner’s kissing, for advice about drifting apart from a long-time partner, and what pressure and dir...
description:
Kate turns into a 90’s teen at Claire’s and Doree turns into Super Mom in a moment of panic. Then, listeners call in asking about how to improve your partner’s kissing, for advice about drifting apart from a long-time partner, and what pressure and direction they apply their prods.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
